title: Indexed and enhanced for loops - write code

content.question: Which of the following code segments will produce the same output as the given code segment?

choices.label: int sum = 0; for (int k = 0; k < arr.length; k++) { sum = sum + 2 * k; } System.out.print(sum);
int sum = 0; for (int k = 0; k <= arr.length; k++) { sum = sum + 2 * k; } System.out.print(sum);
int sum = 0; for (int k = 0; k < arr.length; k++) { sum = sum + 2 * arr[k]; } System.out.print(sum);
int sum = arr[0]; for (int k = 1; k <= arr.length; k++) { sum = sum + 2 * arr[k]; } System.out.print(sum);

content.answer: int sum = 0; for (int k = 0; k < arr.length; k++) { sum = sum + 2 * arr[k]; } System.out.print(sum);

skill.text: 2.B: Write program code involving data abstractions.
